abstract.p: Excerpt from review of movie The Pallbearer, now available on home video (S)

block.p: The Pallbearer 1996. Miramax. $100.71. Laser disk, $39.99. 98 minutes. Closed captioned. PG-13.

Asked to take part in the funeral of a high school classmate he doesn't remember, Tom Thompson (David Schwimmer) is seduced by the dead man's mother (Barbara Hershey). Mix in some whiny people in their mid-20's, and what's left is a charmless romantic comedy in which the characters talk knowingly about Django Reinhardt to establish cultural credentials but ''nobody mentions 'The Graduate,' from which 'The Pallbearer' lifts part of its plot'' (Maslin).
